sn35.72:4.1: “Mendicants, anyone who doesn’t truly understand the six fields of contact’s origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape
sn35.72:4.2: has not lived the spiritual life and is far from this teaching and training.”
sn35.72:5.1: When he said this, one of the mendicants said to the Buddha:
sn35.72:5.3: For I don’t truly understand the six fields of contact’s origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.”
sn35.72:6.1: “What do you think, mendicant? Do you regard the eye like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self’?”
sn35.72:8.1: “Good, mendicant! And regarding the eye, you will truly see clearly with right wisdom that: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn35.72:8.2: In this way you will give up the first field of contact, so that there’s no more future lives.
sn35.72:9.1: Do you regard the ear … nose … tongue … body …
sn35.72:12.1: Do you regard the mind like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self’?”
sn35.72:14.1: “Good, mendicant! And regarding the mind, you will truly see clearly with right wisdom that: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn35.72:14.2: In this way you will give up the sixth field of contact, so that there’s no more future lives.”
